sourcesContent:
import "./App.css" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" function twoDecimals(x) { return Number.parseFloat(x).toFixed(2) } function App() { const [total, setTotal] = useState(0) const [cartItems, setCartItems] = useState({}) const addItemToCart = (price, itemName) => { const cartItemsClone = { ...cartItems } if (itemName in cartItemsClone) { cartItemsClone[itemName] += 1 } else { cartItemsClone[itemName] = 1 } setCartItems(cartItemsClone) setTotal(total + price) } return (
My cart
{Object.keys(cartItems).map((name, i) => { return ( ) })}
Item Name Qty Price
{name} {cartItems[name]}
Cart total: ${total.toFixed(2)}

Starbuzz coffee beverages

House Blend, $1.49

A smooth, mild blend of coffee

addItemToCart(1.49, "House Blend")} > Add to cart

Mocha Caffe Latte, $2.35

Espresso, steamed with milk and chocolate syrup

addItemToCart(2.35, "Mocha Caffe Latte")} > Add to cart

Cappucino, $1.89

A mixture of espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam

addItemToCart(1.89, "Cappucino")} > Add to cart

Chai Tea, $1.85

A drink made with black tea, milk, and honey

addItemToCart(1.85, "Chai Tea")} > Add to cart
) } export default App
